sections.heading: Transfer of Certain Powers and Duties of Department of Agriculture to Commission of Agriculture; Duties of Director of Department of Agriculture; Creation of Michigan Agriculture Preservation Fund Board; Powers and Duties of Natural Resources Commission Previously Vested in Commission on Natural Res
sections.text: Transfer of Certain Powers and Duties of Department of Agriculture to Commission of Agriculture; Duties of Director of Department of Agriculture; Creation of Michigan Agriculture Preservation Fund Board; Powers and Duties of Natural Resources Commission Previously Vested in Commission on Natural Resources; Renaming of Michigan Trails Advisory Council to Michigan Snowmobile and Trails Advisory Council.
